title: *Beautiful 3-Bedroom & 2-Bathroom Apartment* 31 5G
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties* We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building", '*Beautiful 3-Bedroom & 2-Bathroom Apartment*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*SEPTEMBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', "Broker fee of 1 month's rent is due at the lease signing", '*The Apartment Features:*', '3 Queen-Size Bedrooms / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Great Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Ample Closet Space / 2 Full Bathrooms / Spacious Living Space that Can Accommodate a Full Set of Entertainment Furniture & a Dining Table / AC Unit in Each Room / L-Shaped Kitchen Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / Exposed Brick Throughout / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Lounge / Laundry Room / Massive Rooftop / Package Room / Parking Garage* / Storage* / Bike Room / Elevator /', 'A Step Away from the C Train at Kingston-Throop Station /', 'A Short walk to the A Train at Nostrand Ave Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $137,000+ are required / Personal guarantors and "Insurent" are accepted*']
